carpet.rule.betterCarefulBreak.desc: If you break a block while sneaking then the block gets put in your inventory.
carpet.rule.betterCarefulBreak.extra0: Any blocks supported by that block that get broken instantly will also be put in your inventory.
carpet.rule.commandSidebar.desc: Enables players without OP to change what objective is being displayed, and query a player's objectives.
carpet.rule.commandSidebar.extra.0: Players with OP level 1 can also freeze or unfreeze an objective, which will stop scores for an objective from increasing.
carpet.rule.commandTotal.desc: Enables /total command to know the total sum of a scoreboard.
carpet.rule.creativeOneHitKill.desc: Allows players in Creative mode to kill entities in one hit.
carpet.rule.creativeOneHitKill.extra.0: If the player is sneaking, other entities around the target get killed too.
carpet.rule.ignoreExistingRaids.desc: Allows raids to start within 96 blocks of existing raids.
carpet.rule.ignoreExistingRaids.extra.0: May be useful for designing raid farms.
carpet.rule.netheritePickaxeInstantMineD: Deepslate can be instant mined with netherite pickaxe and haste II.
carpet.rule.oldFlintAndSteelBehavior.des: Backports 1.12 flint and steel behavior. Flint and steel can be used for updating observers / buds.
carpet.rule.totalScore.desc: Display total score on the sidebar.
carpet.rule.scoreboardIgnoresBots.desc: Bots don't appear on scoreboards and do not count in the total if they're not in a team.
Real players need to be in a team!
